title: Awesome but a bit time-consuming.
product: Apple iPhone 7, GSM Unlocked, 32GB - Rose Gold (Renewed)
content: When transferring data from my old IPhone to this one, it took longer than I thought and I got to worrying if the battery would have enough charge to complete the process.  So I suggest having fully charged and IOS updated phones before the transfer process.
author: larry w. boelman
Split_2: So I suggest having fully charged and IOS updated phones before the transfer process.
Split_1: When transferring data from my old IPhone to this one, it took longer than I thought and I got to worrying if the battery would have enough charge to complete the process.

title: I bought this with the bundle, that includes case and two glass screen protectors. Great buy!
product: Apple iPhone 7, GSM Unlocked, 32GB - Rose Gold (Renewed)
content: Great value for the money. The battery last long and I love the low power mode, just in case I forget my charger.
author: Carolann Mannings
Split_2: The battery last long and I love the low power mode, just in case I forget my charger.
